item.title: Solar Ebike
item.description: 350 watts of light weight solar panels on a custom frame fixed to a trailer providing a significant boost to ebike range and allowing remote drone flying Table of Contents Overview Shortcomings Initial Specifications Electrical Plan Simplified Electrical Layout Detailed Electrical Layout Hardware Plan Hub Motor Modifications Suspension Fork Electrical Execution Electrical Enclosure Test Fit Electrical Enclosure CAD Models Electrical Enclosure Complted Electrical Wiring Hardware Execution Hub Motor Installation Suspension Fork Installation Finished Build Solar Panels Trailer Circuitry Testing Regen Braking Test Method Solar Trailer Test Method Testing Conclusion Conclusion Gallery Overview This vehicle is a continuation of my E-Cargo bike project and represents a major overhaul of the bike’s electrical system in addition to hardware modifications to accomodate solar panels.
